metadata.title: USN-5586-1 -- SDL vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that SDL (Simple DirectMedia Layer) incorrectly handled memory. An attacker could potentially use this issue to cause a denial of service or other unexpected behavior.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-5586-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  libsdl1.2debian - 1.2.15+dfsg1-3ubuntu0.1+esm2 libsdl1.2-dev - 1.2.15+dfsg1-3ubuntu0.1+esm2 Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro
